encodingDesc.p: This file encoded to comply with EpiDoc Guidelines and Schema version 8 http://www.stoa.org/epidoc/gl/5/

revisionDesc.change: Submit - Combined with text of TM 62457 and TM 62483 (joint by Vergara 2020), added text of Vergara 2022, updated bibliography and revised for Leiden+ compatibility.
Entered Greek text from reference edition

div.p: PHerc. 1100 and 1670 have been digitally edited by Marcel Moser and revised by Vincenzo Damiani as part of the Project Anagnosis and the Würzburger Zentrum für Epikureismusforschung. PHerc. 1636 has been digitally edited by Claudio Vergara (CISPE) and revised by Vincenzo Damiani and Holger Essler as part of the Project Anagnosis and the Würzburger Zentrum für Epikureismusforschung. Digital edition of PHerc. 1577/1579 (on the basis of an unpublished tesi di laurea by Riccardo Cavalli, discussed in Parma, 28 March 2012), addition of fr. 27.2 and combination of the text on the basis of Vergara 2020 and Vergara 2022 by Holger Essler.

bibl.title: Στοιχεῖα e dio in P.Herc. 1670, fr. 27.2 (Filodemo, De providentia)
Herculanensium Voluminum quae supersunt. Collectio altera
I papiri dell’opera De providentia di Filodemo
